ComicInfo.Summary: As the Lamont Foundation's mercenaries close in on Samwi and Professor Jang, hired killers are not the only entities out to end their lives. Calvary's plan to resurrect his wife may have deadly side effects for Belasco and Emma. Meanwhile, on a sunny island in South America, dinosaurs and mad Nazi scientists are hell bent on making sure all members of Team Carnacki meet quick and messy ends. Just another day in the life at the Dept. of Monsterology.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-19 11:33:02. [CVDB507038]
ComicInfo.Characters: Amelia Court, Dominic Belasco, Emma Hampton, Harry Wilmington, Jang Sonam, Javier De Tovar, Jocasta Lamont, Lākhey, Samwi, Sebastian Lamont, Victor Trondheim
ComicInfo.Teams: Department of Cryptozoology, Mythological Studies, Parapsychology and Fortean Phenomena, Nazis
